Uses of Package
org.xchain.framework.net

  • Packages that use org.xchain.framework.net 
    Package Description
    org.xchain.framework.net  
    org.xchain.framework.net.protocol.http  
    org.xchain.framework.net.protocol.resource  
    org.xchain.framework.net.strategy

  • Classes in org.xchain.framework.net used by org.xchain.framework.net 
    Class and Description
    DependencyTracker
    DependencyTracker is used to track dependencies.
    UrlConnectionWrapper
    A URLConnection implementation which wraps another URLConnection.
    UrlExistsStrategy
    Interface for strategies to check if a URL references something that exists.
    UrlFactory
    This factory provides a mechanism to register url protocols when you cannot set the URLStreamHandlerFactory on the URL class.
    UrlFactory.MappedUrlStreamHandlerFactory
    The class used to route protocols to the proper URLStreamHandlerFactory.
    UrlTranslationStrategy
    Base interface for translating resource URLs in the system URLs.
    UrlUtil
    A utility class for Url related methods.
  • Classes in org.xchain.framework.net used by org.xchain.framework.net.protocol.http 
    Class and Description
    TranslatingUrlConnection 
    UrlConnectionWrapper
    A URLConnection implementation which wraps another URLConnection.
    UrlTranslationStrategy
    Base interface for translating resource URLs in the system URLs.
